title: Boris Johnson Exclusive
itunes:title: Boris Johnson Exclusive
description:
The Prime Minister speaks exclusively to Bloomberg's Editor-in-chief John Micklethwait. Micklethwait discusses Johnson's policies and popularity with host Caroline Hepker and Bloomberg's U.K. National editor David Merritt.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
